detail_desc: Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and a frill at the hems. Unlined.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, and medium coverage at the back.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirts in soft pima cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and a chest pocket.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short, straight-cut dress in a cotton weave with a resort collar, short sleeves and buttons down the front. Unlined.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric containing some wool with an elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline. Unlined.

Joggers in stretch cotton twill. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with buttons, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cap in woven fabric with text embroidery at the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks with elasticated tops.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in spotted tulle. High waist with covered elastication at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Satin lining.

Lightweight outdoor gilet with padded sections front and back and reflective details. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and a small zipped pocket at the back. Partly lined in fleece.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with elastication at the top and long sleeves.

Long dress in airy chiffon. Deep V-neck with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and a yoke with elastication and gathers at the top and at the back. Long dolman sleeves and an asymmetric seam with a drawstring at the waist. Flared skirt with a high slit at the front. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Oversized jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a straight hem with slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with reflective details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.

V-neck body in soft lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and a high cut at the back. Jersey lining over the bust.

Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, open back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups with roll edges at the hems.
Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 2-4Y) and ribbed cuffs. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.

Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Patterned bikini top with underwired, shaped cups, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Joggers in a cotton weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets and slim, tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Shirt jacket in imitation leather with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke. Open chest pocket, concealed pockets in the side seams, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined. PETA Approved Vegan-certified and meets PETA’s requirements for vegan products. This certification guarantees that the product is entirely free from materials and substances of animal origin. The polyurethane content of the shirt is water-based and free from DMF.

Rain jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with closed seams at critical points. Detachable hood with elasticated sides, a zip down the front and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Reflective details. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Top in jersey crêpe with a slight sheen. Square neckline, long puff sleeves and gathers in the side seams for a gently draping effect.
